resources.string: Used to obtain the UI hierarchy, providing faster interface analysis capabilities for AI assistants, and does not collect or store any personal information.
Show model configuration selector at the top of the chat interface for easy switching between different model configurations
The current model you are using has limited capabilities and may affect your user experience. We recommend switching to a more powerful model.
Chat, Voice and Desktop Pet will automatically select corresponding prompt configurations based on usage
This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this model?
How to create and import models?
DragonBones has been renamed to LoongBones, and a new online editor has been launched.\nLoongBones supports professional animation features like IK, mesh deformation, and bone binding.
· Recommended: Use the new online editor.\n · Alternative: Download the old v5.6.3 offline editor from third-party archive sites.

· Regardless of which version you use, when exporting data, select JSON for type and version 5.5 (current version doesn\'t support 6.0 runtime).\n · The core export files are: *_ske.json, *_tex.json, *_tex.png.

· For head tracking, add an IK constraint and name the target bone "ik_target".
 · idle animation: Make sure you have an animation named "idle" as the base idle animation, which will automatically loop.
 · Random animations: You can add animations like blink, shake_head, wag_tail, etc.,
 the system will randomly trigger these animations to enrich the pet's expression.
· Package the three exported files into one .zip file for import.
Important Note: In the old editor download page, the Windows and Mac download links are reversed. Please make sure to select the correct link.
Deleting all chat history is irreversible. Consider exporting a backup before proceeding.
Backup files are saved in the \"Download/Operit\" folder
Installing bundled Termux, please grant installation permissions
Operit AI is an intelligent assistant application that helps users use their devices more efficiently, providing interface analysis, chat conversations, and more.
Start a new conversation. Enter your question to get AI response.
This is a simulated AI response. In the actual application, real AI API calls will be integrated here.
Network connection unavailable, please check your network settings
We use DeepSeek API by default. For alternatives, click the custom option below
Your own token is more stable. Overusing the contributors\' keys will bankrupt the author and the software will no longer be updated
Failed to get configuration, please try again later
Please login or register first, the system will automatically get the API key after login

You will be directed to the DeepSeek API website. We integrate DeepSeek access because we consider it the most cost-effective API with powerful performance, various discounts, and disk caching to reduce usage costs.

API access and token configuration are not related to the app developers, and we do not provide any services in this regard or earn any fees.

For your first token usage, we recommend starting with a small amount as it's usually sufficient.
Please use sparingly, our resources are limited
Please don\'t overuse the contributors\' keys, the author also has costs T_T
Our resources are limited, please be considerate
Each free use counts, please value every opportunity
Our budget is crying, please be gentle
Daily free usage: Used %1$d times, %2$d remaining\nFree status will last until app exit
Please try again tomorrow or use your own API key
Please wait %1$d days before using again~
Today\'s free quota all gone QAQ
To prevent developer bankruptcy, waiting time doubles after each use~
This is your first use, next time you\'ll need to wait 1 day~
Free stuff comes with limits, please wait %1$d more days (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧
Loading timeout, you can click \"Skip\" in the top right corner to continue
MCP server failed to start, you can click \"Skip\" in the top right corner to continue
Termux is not running, unable to start plugins
Termux is not authorized, please authorize Termux before using plugins
Node.js not installed in Termux, please install Node.js before using plugins
Bridge initialization failed, unable to start plugins
Error occurred while starting plugins, you can click \"Skip\" in the top right corner to continue
Startup completed, success rate: %1$d%%. Some plugins failed to load

Converse naturally with the AI using on-device speech recognition and synthesis. Your voice is the command, enabling it to perform screen taps, app navigations, and other complex tasks, completely hands-free.
A Powerful Toolbox for Geeks and Developers

With over 40 built-in professional tools for file management, web requests, script execution, and system control. Combined with a robust plugin system, you can automate tasks, and take deep control of your device.

Whether designing web pages, processing media files, or accessing the AI via its floating window, Operit provides a powerful, flexible, and secure environment for creation and assistance. Your data, your control.
When enabled, theme will automatically switch based on system dark mode
When enabled, you can customize the app\'s main colors
Tip: High contrast color combinations work best
When enabled, you can select a custom background image or video
Click select button to add background
Video file is too large and may cause lag or crashes. Please select videos less than 30MB.

Why Should I Care About Token Statistics?

Because it\'s like a restaurant bill, except the \'food\' is AI thinking and the \'money\' is calculated in RMB! Preference analysis is the AI observing your tastes to customize your next \'menu\'. Don\'t worry, even if you chat until your fingers cramp, these costs might not be enough to buy a bubble tea~

Change the display language of the application

Please read and agree to the following terms before use.
Plain Language Version (Not a legal document)

Like you, we don't like long and tedious agreements. Simply put:

OperitAI is a free and open-source software. Its automation features are powerful, so please use them only for personal learning and daily assistance, not for any commercial or prohibited purposes.

You are responsible for all your actions. We are not responsible for any extensions you add or modifications you make to the software.

Regarding privacy: Your voice processing is done locally on your device, which is secure. AI chat data is sent directly to the AI service provider, and we do not handle it.

Welcome to OperitAI. This software is modified and distributed under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License, version 3 (LGPLv3).

1. No Warranty
This software is provided "as is" without any warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. The entire risk as to the quality and performance of the software is with you.

2. Limitation of Liability
In no event unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing will any contributor be liable to you for damages, including any general, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of the use or inability to use the software. Furthermore, the development team is not responsible for any consequences arising from user-installed extension packages (such as MCPs) or from modifications made to this software.

3. User Responsibility and Usage Restrictions
You are fully responsible for any operations conducted through this software and for all their consequences. You agree to use this software for lawful and proper personal purposes and agree that:
a. The automation features included in this software are intended for personal learning, research, and daily assistance only.
b. It is strictly prohibited to use this software and its features for any form of commercial or for-profit activities, or for large-scale automated operations that may improperly affect third-party services.
c. You will be solely responsible for compensating any damages caused to third parties resulting from your use of this software. The community reserves the right to hold you accountable for any misuse.

4. Privacy Protection
We respect and protect the privacy of all our users. We commit to the following:
a. Local Processing: The voice recognition and speech synthesis features of this application operate entirely on your device. Related data will not be uploaded to any cloud servers.
b. Third-Party AI Services: The AI chat service used by this application is supported by third-party large model providers (such as DeepSeek). When you use this feature, your conversation data is sent directly to the respective service provider and does not pass through or get stored on our servers. We recommend that you also review and understand the privacy policies of the respective AI service providers.
c. Data Security: Apart from the cases mentioned above, we do not actively collect or store any of your personal information and will take reasonable data security measures to protect the local data necessary for the application\'s operation.

5. Agreement Modification
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You can review the most current version of the agreement within the application. Your continued use of the service constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.

If there is any inconsistency or conflict between the "Plain Language Version" and the "Formal Legal Agreement", the "Formal Legal Agreement" in Chinese shall prevail. We reserve the final right of interpretation.
Unable to connect to server, please check your network
Server connection timeout, please check your network or try again later
Server refused connection, please try again later
Connection timeout, please check your network
Cannot resolve server address, please check your network
Request timeout, please try again later
Network transfer failed, please check your connection
Request failed, please try again later
Before using the app, we need to set up some basic permissions and select your preferred permission level.
This process takes just a few minutes and will help the app serve you better.
Click the button in the lower right corner to start setup
Please grant the following basic permissions to ensure the app functions properly
Allow the app to read and write files
Allow the app to display floating windows
Allow the app to run in the background
Allow the app to access location information
All basic permissions granted, you can continue to the next step
You have not granted all necessary permissions, which may result in incomplete functionality or abnormal app behavior. Are you sure you want to continue?
Please select your preferred permission level, which will determine the range of features the app can use
Basic app operation permissions, no special permissions required
Enables screen content analysis and operation simulation via accessibility service
Provides ADB-level system access through Shizuku
Superuser permissions, can perform any system operations
You can change the permission level in settings at any time
Cannot open storage permission settings, please authorize manually
Cannot open overlay settings, please authorize manually
Please find the app in the list and set it to \"Not optimized\"
Cannot open battery optimization settings, please set manually
Congratulations! Root permission has been granted. You can now perform privileged operations.
Your device is rooted, but the app hasn\'t been granted root permission. Please click the button below to request permission from your ROOT manager (like Magisk, SuperSU, etc.).
1. Click the \"Request Root Permission\" button below\n2. Select \"Allow\" in the ROOT manager popup\n3. If you don\'t see a popup, check your ROOT manager settings
Your device is not rooted. ROOT requires specific system modifications and may void your warranty. If you need to use ROOT features, please complete the device ROOT process first.
1. ROOT operations carry risk and may void your warranty\n2. Some apps may refuse to run on rooted devices\n3. Improper ROOT operations may cause system instability
Shizuku is a tool that grants apps advanced permissions without requiring root. We need to install this app first.
Shizuku is installed. Now you need to start the Shizuku service. Please follow one of the methods below:

1. Click the "Open Shizuku" button below
2. In the Shizuku app, select "Start via Wireless Debugging"
3. Follow the prompts to enable "Developer Options" and "Wireless Debugging"
4. Allow Shizuku to get wireless debugging permissions

1. Install ADB tools on your computer
2. Connect your phone to your computer via USB
3. Execute in computer command line:
 adb shell sh /sdcard/Android/data/moe.shizuku.privileged.api/files/start.sh
Shizuku service is running. Now you need to grant permission to this app. Click the button below and select \"Allow\" in the dialog that appears.
Note: If you don\'t see the authorization dialog, check:
1. Whether the Shizuku service is running\n2. Try restarting the Shizuku service\n3. Confirm you\'ve allowed overlay display permission
Congratulations! Shizuku is fully set up. You can now use debugging permission features.
The app has a newer version of Shizuku built in. We recommend updating for better compatibility and features.
Termux is a powerful terminal emulator that allows you to use various command line tools. We need to install this app first.
After installation, please open Termux for the first time and wait for initialization to complete, then return to this app to complete the authorization step.
Termux is installed. Now you need to grant Termux the necessary permissions so we can execute commands.
1. Termux is installed and has been opened at least once\n2. Click the \"Check and Authorize\" button to complete authorization
Termux is installed and authorized but not currently running. Configuration operations require Termux to be running in the background.
Termux is authorized but not running. Please launch Termux to continue with the next setup steps.

Termux is running. Now you need to exempt Termux from battery optimization so it can run stably in the background for extended periods. Android\'s battery optimization feature may close Termux in the background, affecting scripts and services.

Termux is exempt from battery optimization. Now you need to configure the Tuna mirror to speed up package downloads. Tuna mirror is a Chinese mirror that can significantly increase Termux package download speeds.
Tuna mirror is configured. Now you need to install the Python environment. Python is a popular programming language that many AI tools and automation scripts require.
Python is installed. Now you need to install the UV package manager. UV is a fast Python package manager and resolver that can replace pip and provide better dependency management.
UV is installed. Now you need to install the Node.js environment. Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment used for running JavaScript code and web applications.
Congratulations! Termux environment is fully configured
You can now use Termux for various command line operations
Failed to extract APK, please try again later
Shizuku installation started, please follow system prompts to complete installation
Shizuku update started, please follow system prompts to complete installation
Termux installation started, please follow system prompts to complete installation
Built-in APK installation failed, opening download page
Cannot open download link, please download and install Termux manually
Skipped Tuna mirror configuration, you can configure the mirror in Termux later
Basic application permissions, no special system authorization required
Added accessibility service support, can simulate screen operations
Added device administrator permissions, can access more system functions
Provides ADB-level system access through Shizuku
Superuser permissions, can execute any system operations
Standard Permissions: Basic application permissions, no special privileges required
Accessibility Permissions: Allows the app to simulate user operations, requires enabling accessibility services
Admin Permissions: Allows the app to access more system functions, such as location services
Debug Permissions: Allows advanced operations through ADB debugging functions, requires Shizuku service
Root Permissions: Allows the app to run as superuser, requires a rooted device
App has gained Root access, can execute privileged commands
Device is rooted, click to request app permissions
Device is not rooted, unable to obtain Root permissions
Failed to extract APK, please try again later
Skipped Tuna mirror configuration, you can configure the mirror in Termux later

You have chosen to skip Tuna mirror configuration. For manual configuration later, run the following command in Termux:

termux-change-repo

Then select Tuna or another mirror from the list.
Safe tools will be executed automatically without prompting. For specific group approvals, please go to Settings - Tool Permission Management.

Cannot automatically grant Termux Run Command permission, please follow these steps:

1. Open Termux
2. Long press the screen, select 'More'
3. Select 'Settings'
4. Enable 'Allow External Apps'

Cannot automatically grant Termux storage permission, please check the following:

1. Shell environment: Make sure you have a working Shell (such as ADB or Root). Note: If using Shizuku, do not start in Root mode.
2. Termux version: Make sure your installed Termux is the built-in version or a Debug version from its official GitHub repository.

First, you need to install the Accessibility Service Provider app. This separate app handles all accessibility service functions.
Now, enable the accessibility service in your device settings. This allows the provider app to analyze screen content.
You must select and enable \"Operit Accessibility Provider\" from the list of services.
Accessibility service is properly configured and ready to use!

Debugger mode performs UI operations via Shell by default. Enabling the accessibility service can significantly accelerate UI automation, but it also substantially increases the risk of being detected and banned by some applications. It is not recommended unless you require maximum operational speed.

While enabling the accessibility service can speed up UI operations, some apps may detect this service and impose restrictions, including account bans. Please enable only after understanding and accepting the associated risks.

Please note: Debug mode already has UI operation capabilities. Enabling the accessibility service only accelerates UI operations but increases the risk of account bans. Unless you need maximum speed, it\'s not recommended. If enabled, please disable it immediately after use.
Please type \"ok\" to confirm you understand the risks

2. Click start recording button
3. Speak clearly
4. Click stop recording
5. Wait for transcription results
Note: Different speech engines may have different accuracy and supported languages

1. Select recognition engine (Android Native/Sherpa-ncnn/Whisper Offline)
2. Select recognition language (Chinese/English etc.)
3. Click start recording button
4. Click stop button after speaking
5. View recognition results

Memory selection includes user preferences and memory base under that preference. To create a new memory base, go to settings to create a new user preference and select it here
When enabled, relevant content will be automatically retrieved from the memory base and attached when sending messages, but this may affect AI response focus.
Can generate a series of plans for execution (mediocre effectiveness, not recommended, will be replaced in the future).
Currently only supports Gemini, Qwen3, Claude and SiliconFlow, enabling built-in thinking.
Can force models that can\'t think to perform thinking. This option is not recommended for thinking models.

All the following options are optional. You can fill them according to your preferences.
Toggle visibility of <think> tags in AI responses

When using default configuration, only deepseek-chat model can be used
Controls the maximum number of tokens AI generates each time
Controls output randomness. Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more random
As an alternative to temperature, the model only considers tokens with the highest Top-P probability
The model only considers the top K tokens with highest probability. 0 means disabled
Enhances the model\'s tendency to talk about new topics. Higher values mean greater penalty
Reduces the likelihood of the model repeating the same words. Higher values mean greater penalty
Further reduces repetition. 1.0 means no penalty, greater than 1.0 reduces repetition likelihood
All parameters reset to default values
When parameters are enabled, they will be included in API requests. By default, all parameters are disabled and use model defaults.

These are prompt configurations from the legacy system. You can view and copy content to the new character card system.

You can copy this content for use in the new character card system.
When enabled, AI responses will be split by punctuation and sent sentence by sentence for a more natural conversation experience.
AI responses will be split and sent by sentences
Control the delay time per character to simulate real typing rhythm
Remove periods, question marks, and exclamation marks at the end of sentences
Prevent AI from using (action emoticon) format

Note: This setting is only controlled by additional prompts, which can only reduce frequency and cannot guarantee 100% prevention. It is recommended to provide targeted instructions in prompt configuration
Insert emotional state tags in conversations to enhance expression
Available emoticons: crying, like_you, happy, surprised, miss_you, speechless, angry, confused, sad
Allow AI to generate character selfie images, requires appearance prompt configuration
Describe character appearance features for generating selfie images
e.g.: long hair, purple eyes, sweater vest...
Tip: Use English keywords to describe appearance features, separate multiple keywords with commas

• Normal Mode: AI responses sent all at once
• Waifu Mode: AI responses split by sentences, each in separate bubbles
• Smart Delay: Calculate delay time based on sentence length
• Auto Cleanup: Remove status tags, show only plain text
• Optional Features: Remove end punctuation, disable action emoticons, enable emoticons
• Use Case: Simulate more natural conversation rhythm
• Note: This mode may not adapt well to tool calls
No custom tags available. Please create them in settings.
Are you sure you want to delete character card "%1$s"? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete tag "%1$s"? This action cannot be undone.
OperitTerminal is a powerful terminal application that provides a complete Linux environment and package management capabilities. We need to install this application first.
A new version of OperitTerminal is available. It is recommended to update for better features and compatibility.
Congratulations! You have installed the latest version of OperitTerminal and can start using its powerful terminal features.
Provides multi-language translation functionality, supporting language conversion of text content. It is recommended to use models that support multiple languages.
Detected that you are in mainland China but selected an overseas service provider. Please confirm whether you have enabled proxy tools
